name: Fast&Grand - Online Driving
description:
Are you ready to drive amazing cars in the open world map? Would you like to race with other real drivers in the free roam mode? If so, download Fast&Grand game now and start to drive amazing cars online!

Fast&Grand is a racing simulator game that allows you to drive French & German cars in the city. There are tens of amazing cars in the game. You can customize or upgrade them as you earn money in the game. Also, you will see some competitors in the game. You can race with these competitors, drive together or chat with them. Dozens of players are waiting for you!

Fast&Grand is one of the best realistic car games of 2021.

FEATURES
 - Multiplayer open world, free roam driving game - 18 different amazing cars.
- Customize color, tuning, spoiler or plate of your car
- Upgrade engine, tire, transmission, brake or suspension of your car
- Free & new
- Daily rewards
- Rewarded ads to earn money
- Chat room that allows you to chat with other drivers
- Realistic driving experience, physics & maps
- Drift or jump to earn money
With this multiplayer real driving simulator you will have so much fun! Are you ready to become the best racer?

If you have any feedback, suggestion or question please don’t hesitate to contact us via e-mail below.
